title: IS_BOAT_ANCHORED_AND_FROZEN
content:
0xD5C39EE6// IsBoatAnchoredAndFrozen
bool IS_BOAT_ANCHORED_AND_FROZEN(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.Returns: Returns whether or not the boat is anchored and frozen.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for IS_BOAT_ANCHORED_AND_FROZEN
IsBoatAnchoredAndFrozen(vehicle)
